document_data.name: Krogynth
document_data.mainbody:
'''Krogynth''' was a rare [[grog]], or [[moonshine]]-like alcoholic beverage that originated from the [[Moonshae Isles]].

{{quote|''Don't knock it until you try it. Krogynth is hard to make and even harder to come by if you don't know the recipe. You may never again get the opportunity to try it.''|[[Nazeem]], [[Chultan (ethnicity)|Chultan]] [[Tabaxi (tribe)|Tabaxi]] smuggler}}
document_data.Description: Krogynth was a strong distilled alcoholic drink of greenish color due to being made using a fermented green mold. The drink was not known for its sophistication and was carried around in [[bucket]]s and served in giant-sized [[mug]]s. The resulting conception had a mild aroma, vaguely reminiscent of [[licorice]] root. Its taste was quite unique and abrasive. Those unaccustomed to the beverage said it tasted like "[[currant]]s mixed with earwax."
